word:
From what has been shown me, Brother Andrews, at times, felt that he would give his life could my husband be in health of mind and body, and take 


                                   -115- 

his place in the work as he had done.--Letter 13, 1869, p. 8. (To Sisters Harriet, Cornelia and Martha, September 24, 1869.) 

Released January 23, 1974.
